    • Constructor Detail

      • Effect

        public Effect()
        Sets up a default constructor for the Effect class to more easily mold subclasses to whatever is needed. Constructs a basic effect based on a sprite using TweenManager to manage the effect. The animate method must be implemented in order to give the effect an animation.

    • Method Detail

      • updateTweenManager

        public void updateTweenManager(float delta)
        Updates the TweenManager based on how much time has passed on delta
        Parameters:
        delta - the time between the last frame and the current frame

      • animate

        public abstract void animate(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,
                             float delta)
        Animates the Sprite
        Parameters:
        batch - the SpriteBatch the animation will be drawn to
        delta - the time between the last frame and the current frame

      • done

        public boolean done()
